CustomField.description: Does at least one of the External System Id fields have a value?
CustomField.formula: IF (OR(NOT(ISBLANK( External_System_Id__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( External_System_Id_Setup__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( External_System_Id2__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( External_System_Id3__c))), 'true','false')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Does at least one of the External System Id fields have a value?
CustomField.label: Has External Id
